OrgName.entry: PALS - SHEFFIELD HEALTH AND SOCIAL CARE NHS FOUNDATION TRUST

Desc.entry: Aims to act as the contact point to enable patients and the public to easily access the new system of patient and public involvement; to provide information to patients to help them make contact with the NHS as easily as possible; to help resolve concerns quickly and efficiently and improve the outcome of care in the process.

DisabledAccess.entry: Some parts of the building have wheelchair access and disabled toilet, please contact for details
